SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Models

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Models.User
com.example.sprite.Models.Admin
public class Admin extends User
Represents an admin user with elevated privileges in the system.

Admins have the ability to:

  • Remove users from the system
  • Remove events from the system
  • View organizer logs and system-wide information
  • Perform administrative actions on any user or event

This class extends User and provides administrative methods that interact with the database service to perform privileged operations.
